remarks: Basic linearity property of a linear operator.  (Contributed by NM, 4-Dec-2007.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 16-Nov-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
lnoval.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
lnoval.2 $e |- Y = ( BaseSet ` W ) $.
lnoval.3 $e |- G = ( +v ` U ) $.
lnoval.4 $e |- H = ( +v ` W ) $.
lnoval.5 $e |- R = ( .sOLD ` U ) $.
lnoval.6 $e |- S = ( .sOLD ` W ) $.
lnoval.7 $e |- L = ( U LnOp W ) $.
lnolin $p |- ( ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ W e. NrmCVec /\ T e. L ) /\ ( A e. CC /\ B e. X /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( T ` ( ( A R B ) G C ) ) = ( ( A S ( T ` B ) ) H ( T ` C ) ) ) $.
